This is Mustard, and it is delicious. In addition, Mustard seeds are a very good source of omega-3 fatty acids, which boost heart health and lower triglycerides. Mustard seeds also contain calcium, dietary fiber, iron, manganese, magnesium, niacin, phosphorus, protein, zinc, and seleniumâ€”a trace mineral that is an antioxidant that may offer protection against asthma, heart attacks, and some cancers.

  • Speeds up your metabolism
